title: Getting an extra SkiaSharp & HarfBuzzSharp NuGet reference with a warning
body:
I installed HarfBuzzSharp (v2.8.2.3) and SkiaSharp (v2.88.3) as NuGet packages in my WPF Windows desktop application. But there are two additional references in VS 2019 v16.11.26 and they have yellow warning icon adorner on it. I'm using .NET 4.8 framework.

Also there are appropriate warning for the solution:
- The referenced component 'C:\Users\Mladen\source\repos\ConsoleApp1212\packages\HarfBuzzSharp.NativeAssets.macOS.2.8.2.3\build\net462....\runtimes\osx\native\libHarfBuzzSharp.dylib' could not be found.
- The referenced component 'C:\Users\Mladen\source\repos\ConsoleApp1212\packages\SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.macOS.2.88.3\build\net462....\runtimes\osx\native\libSkiaSharp.dylib' could not be found.


**Screenshots**
![Ref](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/assets/24816444/a35ed1d5-2b99-402c-a937-bbedd02654b4)
